alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne; Kit Carson County; Yuma (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued August 31 at 1:54AM MDT until September 01 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Increasing Confidence for Critical Fire Weather Conditions Friday... .The favored area for critical fire weather conditions is forecast to be west of a Stratton, NE to Colby and Leoti, KS line Friday afternoon. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR COUNTIES WEST OF HIGHWAY 25... The National Weather Service in Goodland has issued a Fire Weather Watch for wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect from Friday afternoon through Friday evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 001 Cheyenne, Fire Weather Zone 013 Sherman, Fire Weather Zone 027 Wallace, Fire Weather Zone 041 Greeley, Fire Weather Zone 079 Dundy, Fire Weather Zone 252 Yuma, Fire Weather Zone 253 Kit Carson and Fire Weather Zone 254 Cheyenne. * WINDS...South 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 12 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that are started during the afternoon may quickly become out of control. In addition, any activities that generate sparks may easily start a fire.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible red flag warnings.
